description.value:
The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid. You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed and ignore difficult terrain. As part of casting agile feet, you can Stride, Step, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through]; you can instead Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim if you have the appropriate Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Agile Feet]

duration.value: until the end of the current turn
